subject: order number SSN5488
description_text:
My product has came missing the 6+r shift plate and the cable I would like to return my product, please let me know on the process I will have to follow for the return.
Thankyou, Kaleb

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaleb Visram,    The missing item has been shipped for you. Here is the replacement link we have arranged:   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047241254488
